name: DreamWorks Friends
description:
Have a great day with all your favorite characters from DreamWorks Animation!
Play with Shrek and have fun brushing his teeth, feeding him and packing his bag.

INTERACTIVE GAMEPLAY
First, let the sunshine in! Then use Shrek´s favorite toys to wake him up. Help him brush his teeth, choose what he will have for breakfast, and finally, pack his bag!

ENRICHING CONTENT
Learn the importance of a healthy morning routine as you explore multiple activities. Waking up with Shrek and his friends has never been more enjoyable!

JOIN THE FUN & unlock more lovable heroes from Kung Fu Panda, How to Train Your Dragon, Home, Madagascar and Penguins of Madagascar!

Wake Up with Shrek & Friends is developed in collaboration with Fox & Sheep (author of the bestselling Nighty Night series) and the team behind the award-winning BUBL apps series.
